original_text: Now the sea has broken you into pieces. You have fallen to the bottom of the deep sea. All your valuable things and the people who worked in you lie at the bottom of the sea. Now the sea has broken you into pieces. You have fallen to the bottom of the deep sea. All your valuable things and the people who worked in you lie at the bottom of the sea. Now the sea has broken you into pieces.
korean_text: 네가 바다 깊은 데에서 파선한 때에 네 무역품과 네 승객이 다 빠졌음이여

sentences.original_text: Now the sea has broken you into pieces.
You have fallen to the bottom of the deep sea.
and the people who worked in you
lie at the bottom of the sea.
Now the sea has broken you into pieces.

and the people who worked in you
lie at the bottom of the sea.
